divs: Sighting Detailsi was 6 or 7 at the time,,,,it was in NB NB,Canada.A very isolated area.My aint aunt oncles place in Sussex.Me and my older sister where sleeping alone in the living room...I woke up to her crying,asking her what it was all about. She told me to look in the kitchin,there was a man with an axe.I looked and saw the room was brightly lite and something like a shadow was standing 15 feet away moving slightly left to right holding something bright. was very affraid and dindt want to look at its direction,so we blindfully walked 5 steps to my oncles bedroom door crying for help....It was only a bad dream as he said"just go back to bed" ...well we unwillingly did and automaticly fell asleep...thats all i remember. was it just a" telepathique dream"?......Where do we go for answers?.....Do Ihold something here? I know I do...I wish mufon would have somebody up here.I would gladly go under hypnosis to know what really happened that traumatising night...still fighting with depression at 37.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sussex
There were no other sightings in Sussex on or around October 3rd 1983
